ul_223182: find -name "* *" -print0 | sort -rz | \
  while read -d $'\0' f; do mv -v "$f" "$(dirname "$f")/$(basename "${f// /_}")"; done

sort -rz

Explanations about Options.-z: line delimiter is NUL, not newline
Explanations about Options.-V: natural sort of (version) numbers within text
Explanations about Options.-n: compare according to string numerical value
